pullrequest.title: Don't override path with parent path

content.raw:
the fix to Element.cc seems to work. I think the root of the problem is the following lines in parser.cc:

* #!/osrf/sdformat/src/sdformat8_8.4.0/src/parser.cc#lines-913:927

I'll approve this, but I'm wondering what a fix would look like if it was made in parser.cc instead of Element.cc
